subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/hey_hommie-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Got this at the water trough today about an hour ago too. It was in the first 2 seconds of recording. I recorded for little over 4 minutes here tonight. This is the same one with the little girl saying that mommy said she was a big girl. Maybe more in this recording. The 2 evp's are before 2 minutes into recording. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/hey_hommie-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
